item.title: 2022 ðŸ”—
item.description: â€‹ 06/08/2022 history of yakuza crime syndicate death of socrates - painting by Jacques-Louis David - brilliant must watch analysis about socrates death “socrates is guilty of corrupting and of not believing in the gods in whom the city believes, but in other new spiritual things” sentenced to death by drinking hemlock socrates could have escaped into exile but instead he chooses to die taking the opportunity to teach his final lesson that death is not to be feared by the philosopher but embraced as an apotheosis of the soul about painting socrates doesnt seem to care, gesturing to afterlife connection with french revolution reading of the painting from left to right and right to left characters in the painting f1 cars dont refuel refuelling at pit stop -> scope for more strategy for teams and brings thrill to audience why banned in 2010 it costs heavy to maintain fuelling equipment and safety guidelines safety - clock ticks during pit stop and drivers are in all hurry dont chase women women makes you chase because they are not into you they have had terrible previous experiences men shouldn’t chase diverts your attention from things truly matter (chase your dreams) you come across as desperate and pathetic you are going to chase her forever (even if you get her) why ships painted red below 05/08/2022

item.title: 2021 ðŸ”—
item.description: â€‹ 04/11/2021 Dune https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_UM3Lhj9Ywk https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yhYU4ZbLmmk 22/09/2021 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=83iZ68s-9YE Farm Laws India 2020 - Documentary https://dev.to/codesphere/should-i-use-sqlite-postgresql-or-mysql-1o4b 20/09/2021 https://moontowermeta.com/the-most-important-solutions-are-simple-just-not-easy/ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VmbSpTJXozk we hire products to do the job for us https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eJ07g2NtOiY decomplication: the art of first principles thinking www.paulgraham.com/mean.html meanness and success are inversely correlated (PG admits there might be selection bias here) for most of history success meant control of scarce resources this is changing, increasingly the games that matter are not zero-sum being mean makes you stupid, makes you fight, and in turn drains your energy mean founders struggle with hiring best people (since best people have better options and mean founders cant convince to join them) 03/09/2021
